title: Service disruption due to sleeper replacement works

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #YewTee and #Sembawang are now running normally. Free bus services have ceased.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #YewTee and #Sembawang are now running normally.
[NSL] UPDATE: Free public & shuttle buses are now available at affected stations between #YewTee and #Sembawang.
Due to sleeper replacement works,there will be no train service between Sembawang and Yew Tee stations.
